articles.title: Marvel's Avengers Will Soon Always Allow Players to Play as the Same Heroes As Others - IGN SOUTH EAST ASIA
articles.description: If you and your friends want to all play as Iron Man, you will soon be able to do so.
articles.content:
In July 2021, Marvel's Avengers will permanently allow for players to play as the same heroes as others.

articles.title: Indonesia confirms more medical officers reported dead as virus cases surge due to holiday travels - The Star Online
articles.description: Over a dozen fully vaccinated doctors have died of Covid-19 in Indonesia, a medical association said Friday, as the Southeast Asian country battles a rash of severe cases in inoculated medical workers and highly infectious new virus strains.
